# HP domain
```{R}
library(dplyr)
rm(list=ls())


domain <- read.csv("/Users/lubeifang/Desktop/PA_HP/files/domain_results.csv")
domain <- domain[domain$Evalue != 0,]

table(domain$File)
length(unique(domain$File))
table(domain$Domain)
length(unique(domain$Domain))

ggplot(domain, aes(x=Domain, y=-log10(Evalue), color=File)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_bw() +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1),
        legend.position = "none") +
  labs(title="Domain E-value Distribution", x="Domain", y="-log10(E-value)") +
  scale_color_discrete(name="File") +
  geom_text(aes(label=ifelse(-log10(Evalue) > 3, as.character(File), '')),
            hjust=0, vjust=0, size=3, check_overlap = TRUE)
ggsave("/Users/lubeifang/Desktop/PA_HP/Figures/F1_deg/domain_Evalue_distribution.pdf", width=16, height=6)

ggplot(domain, aes(x=File, y=-log10(Evalue), color=Domain)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_bw() +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1),
        legend.position = "none") +
  labs(title="HP E-value Distribution", x="HP", y="-log10(E-value)") +
  scale_color_discrete(name="File") +
  geom_text(aes(label=ifelse(-log10(Evalue) > 3, as.character(Domain), '')),
            hjust=0, vjust=0, size=3, check_overlap = TRUE)
ggsave("/Users/lubeifang/Desktop/PA_HP/Figures/F1_deg/HP_Evalue_distribution.pdf", width=16, height=6)
```
